alert.note: Alert for Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Southern Ventura County Mountains (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued April 04 at 3:21AM PDT until April 04 at 3:00PM PDT by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM PDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH WIND WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...North winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. * WHERE...Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains, Southern Ventura County Mountains, Northern Ventura County Mountains and Interstate 5 Corridor. * WHEN...Until 3 PM PDT this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Interstate 5 Corridor; Northern Ventura County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Interior Mountains; Southern Ventura County Mountains
